i recently watched a movie entitled: islam: what the west needs to know.  Islam has always been an elusive religion to me, after watching the film i wondered more about the intentions of all these religious types, be it: christian, muslim, jewish etc....where are our loyalties i ask? to what we are conditioned, by family race, status, etc.. or to our own selves and minds and opinions?  being an american i do realize the temptation to aggravate quickly, "jump the gun" spend, spend, spend. and all that capitalistic jargon, but i also see the world and see all of the other styles of thought and life, i am intrigued by the rest of the world and it is strange to watch the culture cleansing that is happening all over the world in the name of business.  and really thats all it is, if any other country had the chance they would be the head honcho..i guess my point is that i know for a fact there are tons of people all over the planet that are more advanced than this primitive attempt to be "king of the planet"  regardless of where they were sculpted by their surroundings, its time to break the frickin' molds, correct these inefficient patterns of destruction and begin applying the physics of harmony to the power of unity.   oh yea this movie any good? hope there are seeders...
